Embed PlantUML diagrams in Quarto documents using the `quarto-extension-plantuml` extension. 

<h2 style="display: flex; align-items: center;">
  <img src="https://simpleicons.org/icons/uml.svg" alt="UML Logo" style="height: 1em; margin-right: 0.5em;">
  Embedding a PlantUML Diagram
</h2>

A simple PlantUML diagram.

```{plantuml}
@startuml
Alice -> Bob: Authentication Request
Bob --> Alice: Authentication Response
@enduml
```
